snippet: N.B.A. Commissioner David Stern canceled the first two weeks of the season Monday night, saying the sides were “very far apart on virtually all issues.”
lead_paragraph: N.B.A. Commissioner David Stern canceled the first two weeks of the season Monday night, saying the sides were “very far apart on virtually all issues.”

headline.main: N.B.A. Cancels First 2 Weeks of Play
headline.print_headline: N.B.A. Cancels First 2 Weeks of Play
headline.seo: N.B.A. Cancels Two Weeks of Play
